lead_paragraph: FLEISCHER--Paula, on January 22, 2016 peacefully at home in New Rochelle, surrounded by family, at 103. Loving mother of Yvette (Mark) Goorevitch, and the late Donald Tolchin. Devoted grandmother of Shaun (Caitlin) Tolchin and Jillian Goorevitch (Michael Rosen). Adoring great-grandmother of Remy. Funeral service Monday, 2:30pm at Larchmont Temple. Interment in Florida. 1/3
